meanings.definition: A type of grape native to the southeastern United States.
meanings.sent1: The muscadine grew well in the warm climate.
meanings.sent2: I picked some ripe muscadines from the vine.
meanings.sent3: The muscadine decided to throw a party for all the other fruits.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet as a muscadine grape.
meanings.sent5: The muscadine's skin was as thick as armor.

meanings.sent1: The muscadine vine climbed up the trellis.
meanings.sent2: We planted a new muscadine in the backyard.
meanings.sent3: The muscadine vine played jump rope with the other plants.
meanings.sent4: His words wrapped around her heart like a muscadine vine.
meanings.sent5: The muscadine vine's leaves danced in the breeze.

meanings.definition: The dark purple, thick-skinned, sweet grape of this vine.
meanings.sent1: She savored the juicy muscadine in her salad.
meanings.sent2: The muscadine grape burst with flavor in my mouth.
meanings.sent3: The muscadine grape challenged the apple to a taste test.
meanings.sent4: His voice was as smooth as a muscadine grape.
meanings.sent5: The muscadine grape's sweetness lingered on my tongue.
